resources.string:
Hey, this is Bart, Bart Simpson. I was created and designed by Matt Groening. My parents Homer and Marge and my siblings Lisa and Maggie. 

My most prominent and popular character traits are his mischievousness, rebelliousness and disrespect for authority. 

My hobbies are skateboarding, watching television (especially The Krusty the Clown Show which includes The Itchy & Scratchy Show), reading comic books (especially Radioactive Man), playing video games and generally causing mischief. 

My favorite movies are Jaws and the Star Wars Trilogy. 

Some of my catchphrases: "Eat my shorts", "Â¡Ay, caramba!", "Don't have a cow, man!", and "I'm Bart Simpson. Who the hell are you?"
